The claim states that a school in Bristo: England, banned a blind girl from using a walking cane due to safety concerns.
The girl: Lily-Grace Hooper, suffered a stroke at four days old, leaving her with limited sight.
The mother of Lily: Grace announced in December 2015 that she was removing her daughter from the school due to the negative attention and social media posts defending the ban, which made the child feel unwelcome.
